input.sentences: every year | our small town has a parade .
these men were dressed in kilts and played bagpipes .
some drove vintage cars down the street .
in addition to the parade | there was a small carnival . i hope this clown does n't scare off the children !
we won a stuffed toy at one of the carnival games .
output.sentences: A German Shepherd was having a nice stroll in the woods.
He found a pretty large stick that was a lot of fun, but soon he got bored.
Eventually he found his way to a walking trail.
He walked to the top of a bridge and met and befriended a human lady.
He had a great day and slept well that evening.
